original_text: So Moses hearkened to the voice of his father in law, and did all that he had said.
korean_text: 이에 모세가 자기 장인의 말을 듣고 그 모든 말대로 하여

sentences.original_text: So Moses hearkened to the voice of his father in law
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 모세는 그의 장인의 목소리에 귀를 기울였고

sentences.original_text: and did all that he had said
